original_text:
Magic Oak
Questa slot prodotta dalla Habanero ha come tema principale una foresta incantata dove vivono tanti simpatici animali: il saggio coniglio con gli occhiali da vista, il cinghiale dalla capigliatura alla moda, la volpe sorridente, l’orsetto vestito con gilet e camicia, lo scoiattolo dai grandi occhi azzurri e il gufo che tutto osserva. Lo grafica dei simboli è quella dei cartoni animati, con alcune animazioni che rendono i personaggi dotati di vita. La griglia di gioco ha una cornice di legno ed è immersa nel bosco, davanti alla grande quercia magica che dà il nome alla slot. Sulla destra c’è una pianta da cui fuoriesce una luce colorata, non solo un abbellimento grafico in quanto avrà una funzione durante il gioco. Sotto i rulli è indicato il valore della nostra scommessa, i tasti + e – per aumentarne il livello e quello per impostare la scommessa massima in un colpo solo. Ci sono poi i pulsanti per l’avvio del gioco e per far partire i giri automatici.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
Per questa slot gli sviluppatori di Habanero hanno pensato a una griglia con 4 rulli e 4 righe con 20 payline fisse, non modificabili. La scommessa minima è di 0,01 € per linea a cui andrà moltiplicato il livello di puntata (1, 2, 5, 7 e 10). La puntata totale minima (0,01 € per linea e livello scommessa 1) è di 0,20 €, la più alta è pari a 100 €. Si può decidere di impostare un numero di giri automatici che va da 10 sino a un massimo di 500. L’RTP è molto buono, pari al 96,71%.
Simboli e funzionalità di Magic Oak
In questa slot si vince quando almeno 4 simboli (sino a un massimo di 16) si presentano in posizioni adiacenti. I simboli base sono rappresentati dai semi delle carte da gioco e hanno tutti lo stesso valore: con la scommessa minima  di 0,01 €, 4 simboli pagano 0,05 €, con 16 simboli si arriva a 4 €. Sempre tenendo conto della scommessa minima, la volpe e il coniglio pagano al massimo 12 €, l’orsetto lavatore 15 €, il cinghiale 25 €, la volpe 30 € e il gufo 50 €. Il simbolo Jolly è la tavoletta su cui è incisa la scritta Wild: oltre a pagare 250 € se appare 16 volte, ha la funzione di sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, rappresentato dalla tavoletta con su scritto Scatter. Servono quattro Scatter per attivare i giri gratuiti: bisognerà cliccare su ogni simbolo Scatter dietro cui si cela il numero di giri gratuiti vinti,  che possono essere 2, 3 o 4. Durante i giri gratuiti lo Scatter non può comparire.
Come dicevamo nel primo paragrafo, la pianta che si trova accanto alla griglia di gioco e da cui esce un bagliore, ha una funzione: da qui infatti usciranno casualmente dei bagliori gialli o azzurri, che rimarranno sospesi accanto alla griglia sino a quando non voleranno sui rulli. Il bagliore azzurro sostituirà tutti i simboli dello stesso tipo con il simbolo Wild, il bagliore giallo sostituisce un singolo simbolo sempre con il simbolo Wild.

raw_translation.response:
Magic Oak
Habanero's slot game Magic Oak takes you on a journey through an enchanted forest where cute animals reside. The wise rabbit sporting glasses, the trendy-haired boar, the smiling fox, the vest-clad bear, the blue-eyed squirrel, and the all-seeing owl are some of the cartoon-like symbols that come to life with exciting animations. The wooden-framed grid sits amidst the forest, facing the magical oak that lends its name to the slot. A plant to the right emits colored light that serves a purpose during gameplay, not just a visual embellishment. The bet value sits below the reels, with buttons for increasing the level and setting the maximum bet in one click, plus buttons for starting the game and initiating automatic spins.

Game features
Habanero devised a grid with four reels, four rows, and 20 fixed paylines that cannot be adjusted. The minimum bet per line is €0.01, multiplied by the betting level (1, 2, 5, 7, and 10). The minimum total bet (€0.01 per line and betting level 1) is €0.20 and the maximum is €100. You can set automatic spins ranging from 10 to 500. The game's RTP is high at 96.71%.

Magic Oak Symbols and Features
You win by landing at least four symbols (up to a maximum of 16) in adjacent positions. The basic symbols are card suits and have the same value: with a minimum bet of €0.01, four symbols pay €0.05 and 16 symbols pay €4. The fox and rabbit pay a maximum of €12, the raccoon €15, the boar €25, the fox €30, and the owl €50, all with the same minimum bet. The Wild symbol is a tablet engraved with the word Wild, paying €250 when it appears 16 times and replacing all symbols except for the Scatter symbol, which is a tablet with the word Scatter. Four Scatters trigger free spins, and you must click on each Scatter symbol to reveal the number of free spins won, which could be 2, 3 or 4. During free spins, the Scatter will not appear.

As mentioned earlier, the plant next to the grid emits a glow that serves a function. Here, yellow or blue glows randomly appear and remain suspended next to the grid until they fly onto the reels. The blue glow replaces all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, while the yellow glow replaces a single symbol with the Wild symbol.

raw_translation.response:
Magic Oak: An Enchanted Forest Full of Winnings

This slot game produced by Habanero features an enchanted forest where many friendly animals live: the wise rabbit wearing glasses, the boar with a trendy hairstyle, the smiling fox, the bear dressed in vest and shirt, the squirrel with big blue eyes and the owl watching everything. The graphics of the symbols are those of cartoons, with some animations that make the characters come to life. The game grid has a wooden frame and is immersed in the forest, in front of the great magical oak that gives its name to the slot. On the right there is a plant from which a colored light emerges, not just a graphic embellishment as it will have a function during the game. Below the reels, the value of our bet is indicated, with the + and - buttons to increase the level and the one to set the maximum bet in one go. There are also buttons to start the game and to start the automatic spins.

Main Features of the Slot

For this slot, the developers of Habanero have thought of a grid with 4 reels and 4 rows with 20 fixed paylines, which cannot be modified. The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, to which the betting level (1, 2, 5, 7 and 10) will be multiplied. The minimum total bet (€0.01 per line and 1 bet level) is €0.20, the highest is €100. You can choose to set a number of automatic spins ranging from 10 up to a maximum of 500. The RTP is very good, at 96.71%.

Symbols and Functions of Magic Oak

In this slot, you win when at least 4 symbols (up to a maximum of 16) appear in adjacent positions. The basic symbols are represented by the playing card suits and all have the same value: with a minimum bet of €0.01, 4 symbols pay out €0.05, and with 16 symbols you can get up to €4. Always keeping in mind the minimum bet, the fox and the rabbit pay out a maximum of €12, the raccoon €15, the boar €25, the fox €30 and the owl €50. The Wild symbol is the tablet on which the word Wild is engraved: in addition to paying out €250 if it appears 16 times, it has the function of substituting all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the tablet with the word Scatter. Four Scatters are needed to activate the free spins: you will have to click on each Scatter symbol behind which the number of free spins won is hidden, which can be 2, 3 or 4. During the free spins, the Scatter cannot appear.

As we mentioned in the first paragraph, the plant located next to the game grid and from which a glow emanates has a function: here, in fact, yellow or blue glows will randomly emerge, which will remain suspended next to the grid until they fly onto the reels. The blue glow replaces all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, while the yellow glow replaces a single symbol with the Wild symbol.

message.content:
Magic Oak: An Enchanted Forest Full of Winnings

This slot game produced by Habanero features an enchanted forest where many friendly animals live: the wise rabbit wearing glasses, the boar with a trendy hairstyle, the smiling fox, the bear dressed in vest and shirt, the squirrel with big blue eyes and the owl watching everything. The graphics of the symbols are those of cartoons, with some animations that make the characters come to life. The game grid has a wooden frame and is immersed in the forest, in front of the great magical oak that gives its name to the slot. On the right there is a plant from which a colored light emerges, not just a graphic embellishment as it will have a function during the game. Below the reels, the value of our bet is indicated, with the + and - buttons to increase the level and the one to set the maximum bet in one go. There are also buttons to start the game and to start the automatic spins.

Main Features of the Slot

For this slot, the developers of Habanero have thought of a grid with 4 reels and 4 rows with 20 fixed paylines, which cannot be modified. The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, to which the betting level (1, 2, 5, 7 and 10) will be multiplied. The minimum total bet (€0.01 per line and 1 bet level) is €0.20, the highest is €100. You can choose to set a number of automatic spins ranging from 10 up to a maximum of 500. The RTP is very good, at 96.71%.

Symbols and Functions of Magic Oak

In this slot, you win when at least 4 symbols (up to a maximum of 16) appear in adjacent positions. The basic symbols are represented by the playing card suits and all have the same value: with a minimum bet of €0.01, 4 symbols pay out €0.05, and with 16 symbols you can get up to €4. Always keeping in mind the minimum bet, the fox and the rabbit pay out a maximum of €12, the raccoon €15, the boar €25, the fox €30 and the owl €50. The Wild symbol is the tablet on which the word Wild is engraved: in addition to paying out €250 if it appears 16 times, it has the function of substituting all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the tablet with the word Scatter. Four Scatters are needed to activate the free spins: you will have to click on each Scatter symbol behind which the number of free spins won is hidden, which can be 2, 3 or 4. During the free spins, the Scatter cannot appear.

As we mentioned in the first paragraph, the plant located next to the game grid and from which a glow emanates has a function: here, in fact, yellow or blue glows will randomly emerge, which will remain suspended next to the grid until they fly onto the reels. The blue glow replaces all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, while the yellow glow replaces a single symbol with the Wild symbol.

raw_translation_without_faq.response:
Magic Oak is a slots game that takes place in an enchanted forest full of friendly animals. Habanero, the developers, have created a gaming grid that features 4 reels and 4 rows with 20 fixed paylines that can't be changed.

The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, with the betting level (1, 2, 5, 7 and 10) multiplied on top of that. The minimum total bet is €0.20 and the highest is €100. You're able to choose between 10 and 500 automatic spins, and the RTP is 96.71%.

The symbols follow the wildlife theme of the game and are cartoon-like. The Wild symbol is represented by a tablet on which the word Wild is engraved. It substitutes all other symbols on the reels except the Scatter, whose tablet is marked with the word Scatter. If you match four Scatters, you'll activate the free spins, and you determine how many free spins you'll get by clicking on each Scatter symbol.

On the right of the grid, there's a plant with a colored light emanating from it. This circle has an important feature in the game. Yellow or blue glows will randomly emerge from the circle and fly onto the reels. The yellow glow replaces one symbol with the Wild symbol, and the blue glow replaces all of a particular symbol with a Wild symbol.

The Magic Oak slot is easy to play and exciting to explore, with lots of opportunities to win big.

response.headline: Symbols and paylines
response.content: The symbols in Magic Oak include the playing card suits and various forest animals such as a rabbit, boar, fox, bear, squirrel, and owl. With a minimum bet of €0.01, 4 symbols pay out €0.05, and with 16 symbols, you can get up to €4. The fox and rabbit pay out a maximum of €12, the raccoon €15, the boar €25, the fox €30 and the owl €50. To win, at least 4 symbols (up to a maximum of 16) must appear in adjacent positions.

response.headline: Wild and Scatter symbols
response.content: The Wild symbol in Magic Oak is a tablet with the word 'Wild' engraved on it. The Wild symbol substitutes all symbols except the Scatter and pays out €250 if it appears 16 times. The Scatter symbol is a tablet with the word 'Scatter' on it. Four Scatters activate the free spins, and players click on each Scatter behind which the number of free spins won is hidden, which can be 2, 3, or 4. During the free spins, the Scatter cannot appear.

response.headline: Special features and bonuses
response.content: In Magic Oak, the plant located next to the game grid emits yellow or blue glows that will remain suspended next to the grid until they fly onto the reels. The blue glow replaces all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, while the yellow glow replaces a single symbol with the Wild symbol.

Review: Magic Oak: An Enchanted Forest Full of Winnings

This slot game produced by Habanero features an enchanted forest where many friendly animals live: the wise rabbit wearing glasses, the boar with a trendy hairstyle, the smiling fox, the bear dressed in vest and shirt, the squirrel with big blue eyes and the owl watching everything. The graphics of the symbols are those of cartoons, with some animations that make the characters come to life. The game grid has a wooden frame and is immersed in the forest, in front of the great magical oak that gives its name to the slot. On the right there is a plant from which a colored light emerges, not just a graphic embellishment as it will have a function during the game. Below the reels, the value of our bet is indicated, with the + and - buttons to increase the level and the one to set the maximum bet in one go. There are also buttons to start the game and to start the automatic spins.

Main Features of the Slot

For this slot, the developers of Habanero have thought of a grid with 4 reels and 4 rows with 20 fixed paylines, which cannot be modified. The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, to which the betting level (1, 2, 5, 7 and 10) will be multiplied. The minimum total bet (€0.01 per line and 1 bet level) is €0.20, the highest is €100. You can choose to set a number of automatic spins ranging from 10 up to a maximum of 500. The RTP is very good, at 96.71%.

Symbols and Functions of Magic Oak

In this slot, you win when at least 4 symbols (up to a maximum of 16) appear in adjacent positions. The basic symbols are represented by the playing card suits and all have the same value: with a minimum bet of €0.01, 4 symbols pay out €0.05, and with 16 symbols you can get up to €4. Always keeping in mind the minimum bet, the fox and the rabbit pay out a maximum of €12, the raccoon €15, the boar €25, the fox €30 and the owl €50. The Wild symbol is the tablet on which the word Wild is engraved: in addition to paying out €250 if it appears 16 times, it has the function of substituting all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the tablet with the word Scatter. Four Scatters are needed to activate the free spins: you will have to click on each Scatter symbol behind which the number of free spins won is hidden, which can be 2, 3 or 4. During the free spins, the Scatter cannot appear.

As we mentioned in the first paragraph, the plant located next to the game grid and from which a glow emanates has a function: here, in fact, yellow or blue glows will randomly emerge, which will remain suspended next to the grid until they fly onto the reels. The blue glow replaces all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, while the yellow glow replaces a single symbol with the Wild symbol.

response.headline: Bonus Features and Free Spins

Aside from free spins, the game also features glows from a nearby plant that randomly emerges yellow or blue. The blue glow replaces all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, while the yellow glow replaces a single symbol with the Wild symbol.

response.headline: Overall Game Experience and Enjoyment
response.content: Overall, Magic Oak offers an enchanting experience through its graphics and gameplay. The winnings are relatively small but consistent, making it suitable for casual players and beginners. The payout percentage is impressive, giving players satisfactory rewards. Habanero successfully created a game that brings players to a magical forest, offering them a chance to win prizes.

Review:
 
Gameplay Mechanics and Rules

Magic Oak features a 4x4 grid with 20 fixed paylines and a minimum bet of €0.01 per line. The game has a betting level of 1, 2, 5, 7, and 10 to be multiplied accordingly. The RTP is 96.71%, and the slot has an autoplay feature that ranges from 10 to 500 spins.

Betting Options and Limits

The minimum total bet for Magic Oak is €0.20, while the maximum is €100. The betting level ranges from 1 to 10, and the minimum bet is €0.01 per line. Players can easily adjust their bets by using the + and - buttons located below the reels.

Symbols and Their Importance

Magic Oak features symbols that depict friendly animals residing in an enchanted forest, such as the owl, the bear, the fox, the rabbit, and the boar. There are also basic symbols that represent playing card suits. Players need to have at least 4 symbols in adjacent positions to gain rewards. The Wild symbol replaces all symbols except the Scatter, while the Scatter symbol activates free spins with 2-4 free spins.

Bonus Features and Free Spins

Players need to land 4 Scatter symbols to activate the free spins feature. During free spins, the Scatter symbol cannot appear again. Aside from free spins, the game also features glows from a nearby plant that randomly emerges yellow or blue. The blue glow replaces all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, while the yellow glow replaces a single symbol with the Wild symbol.

Overall Game Experience and Enjoyment

Overall, Magic Oak offers an enchanting experience through its graphics and gameplay. The winnings are relatively small but consistent, making it suitable for casual players and beginners. The payout percentage is impressive, giving players satisfactory rewards. Habanero successfully created a game that brings players to a magical forest, offering them a chance to win prizes.

faq.answer: The minimum bet per line is €0.01.

faq.question: Can I modify the 20 paylines of Magic Oak?
faq.answer: No, the paylines are fixed and cannot be changed.

faq.answer: The RTP of Magic Oak is 96.71%.

faq.answer: The Wild symbol can substitute all symbols except the Scatter and can pay out up to €250 if 16 times appear on the reels.

faq.answer: You need to get 4 Scatter symbols to activate the free spins.

faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Magic Oak".

Please provide an FAQ:

Review: Magic Oak: An Enchanted Forest Full of Winnings

This slot game produced by Habanero features an enchanted forest where many friendly animals live: the wise rabbit wearing glasses, the boar with a trendy hairstyle, the smiling fox, the bear dressed in vest and shirt, the squirrel with big blue eyes and the owl watching everything. The graphics of the symbols are those of cartoons, with some animations that make the characters come to life. The game grid has a wooden frame and is immersed in the forest, in front of the great magical oak that gives its name to the slot. On the right there is a plant from which a colored light emerges, not just a graphic embellishment as it will have a function during the game. Below the reels, the value of our bet is indicated, with the + and - buttons to increase the level and the one to set the maximum bet in one go. There are also buttons to start the game and to start the automatic spins.

Main Features of the Slot

For this slot, the developers of Habanero have thought of a grid with 4 reels and 4 rows with 20 fixed paylines, which cannot be modified. The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, to which the betting level (1, 2, 5, 7 and 10) will be multiplied. The minimum total bet (€0.01 per line and 1 bet level) is €0.20, the highest is €100. You can choose to set a number of automatic spins ranging from 10 up to a maximum of 500. The RTP is very good, at 96.71%.

Symbols and Functions of Magic Oak

In this slot, you win when at least 4 symbols (up to a maximum of 16) appear in adjacent positions. The basic symbols are represented by the playing card suits and all have the same value: with a minimum bet of €0.01, 4 symbols pay out €0.05, and with 16 symbols you can get up to €4. Always keeping in mind the minimum bet, the fox and the rabbit pay out a maximum of €12, the raccoon €15, the boar €25, the fox €30 and the owl €50. The Wild symbol is the tablet on which the word Wild is engraved: in addition to paying out €250 if it appears 16 times, it has the function of substituting all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the tablet with the word Scatter. Four Scatters are needed to activate the free spins: you will have to click on each Scatter symbol behind which the number of free spins won is hidden, which can be 2, 3 or 4. During the free spins, the Scatter cannot appear.

As we mentioned in the first paragraph, the plant located next to the game grid and from which a glow emanates has a function: here, in fact, yellow or blue glows will randomly emerge, which will remain suspended next to the grid until they fly onto the reels. The blue glow replaces all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, while the yellow glow replaces a single symbol with the Wild symbol.

faq.answer: Magic Oak is an online slot game produced by Habanero that features an enchanted forest full of friendly animals.

faq.question: What are the main features of Magic Oak?
faq.answer: Magic Oak has 4 reels and 4 rows with 20 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, and the maximum bet is €100. You can choose automatic spins ranging from 10 to 500, and the RTP is 96.71%.

faq.question: What are the basic symbols in Magic Oak?
faq.answer: The basic symbols in Magic Oak are represented by the playing card suits and all have the same value.

faq.question: What do the animal symbols in Magic Oak pay out?
faq.answer: The fox and the rabbit pay out a maximum of €12, the raccoon €15, the boar €25, the fox €30, and the owl €50.

faq.question: What is the Wild symbol in Magic Oak?
faq.answer: The Wild symbol in Magic Oak is a tablet on which the word Wild is engraved, and it substitutes all symbols except the Scatter.

faq.question: What is the Scatter symbol in Magic Oak?
faq.answer: The Scatter symbol in Magic Oak is a tablet with the word Scatter and four of them are needed to activate free spins.

faq.question: What happens during free spins in Magic Oak?
faq.answer: During free spins in Magic Oak, the Scatter symbol cannot appear, and players can win up to 4 free spins.

faq.question: What is the function of the plant in Magic Oak?
faq.answer: The plant in Magic Oak emits yellow or blue glows, which replace a single symbol with the Wild symbol or replace all symbols of the same type with the Wild symbol, respectively.

The image should also showcase the yellow and blue glows that randomly appear during the game. Make sure to include the game title "Magic Oak" in the image.
